Variable Label: SC Needs or Uses Medication Currently
Survey Question: Does this child CURRENTLY need or use medicine prescribed by a doctor, other than vitamins?

Survey Question: Is this child’’s need for prescription medicine because of ANY medical, behavioral, or other health condition?

Survey Question: Is this child’’s need for medical care, mental health, or educational services because of ANY medical, behavioral, or other health condition?

Survey Question: Is this a condition that has lasted or is expected to last 12 months or longer?

Survey Question: Is this child limited or prevented in any way in his or her ability to do the things most children of the same age can do?

Variable Label: SC Limited Ability from Health Condition
Survey Question: Is this child’’s limitation in abilities because of ANY medical, behavioral, or other health condition?
